name: 布莱恩·麦克马纳蒙
name_full: 布莱恩·麦克马纳蒙 Brian McManamon
introduction: A Minnesota native, Brian McManamon is best known for portraying the DC Comics villain Basil Karlo (aka Clayface) on FOX's hit "Gotham". His recent credits include "Succession" (HBO) as well as the NBFF Award-winning feature film "The Subject". Brian received a BFA from Boston University and an MFA from the Yale School of Drama. In addition to his career as an actor, Brian is a sought-after coach and acting instructor, teaching at some of the top actor training programs; including Syracuse University, NYU and Juilliard.
